field.name: id
field.query: select `m`.`id` AS `id`, concat(`t`.`short_code_el`, ':: ', `i`.`title_el`) AS `name_el` from `#__ethaae_institutes_structure` `i` join `#__ethaae_unit_type` `t` on(`i`.`unit_type_id` = `t`.`id`) LEFT JOIN #__ethaae_institutes_info m on (i.id = m.fk_unit_id) where t.grouping=1 AND i.ceasedate is null AND m.id is not null
field.label: COM_ETHAAE_UNITS_INFO_ITEM_ID_SELECT_LABEL
